name.zh_CN: 智赢选品-免费的侵权检测和关键词工具

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Amazon Brand Infringement Detection, supports Amazon, OZON, 1688, Mercado Libre, completely free;
short.zh_CN: 智赢选品-亚马逊品牌侵权检测，支持亚马逊，OZON，1688，美客多，完全免费；提供快速预览，关键词反查，以图搜图，1688批量采集，亚马逊品牌侵权检测，品牌备案查询(数据来源WIPO)

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
**Completely Free Product Selection Plugin - Zying Product Selection**

**Amazon Product Selection**
[Quick Preview] Get detailed data for all ASINs on the current page with a single click, significantly boosting product analysis efficiency.
[Brand Analysis] Check if the brand name of a product is trademarked to avoid infringement.
[Recommended Markets] Avoid overcrowded markets.
[Keyword Reverse Lookup] Retrieve the rankings of various keywords for this ASIN in natural traffic. Supports keyword export for direct use in optimizing listings and PPC ads.
[Top Keywords Reverse Lookup] Check the top keywords driving clicks and conversions for any target ASIN, i.e., the keywords buyers use to find and convert on that ASIN.
[Multi-Site Support] Supports 12 Amazon sites and seven languages.

**MeiKeDuo Product Selection**
[Quick Preview] Improve your competitive analysis efficiency by adding more detailed data to the product list in a way that DOM  blocking(only appending new DOM elements, without modification).

[Product Sourcing] One-click access to 1688 for reverse image searches and profit calculations.


**OZON Product Selection**
[Quick Preview] Improve your competitive analysis efficiency by adding more detailed data to the product list in a way that DOM  blocking(only appending new DOM elements, without modification).
[Quick Preview] Quickly obtain detailed SKU information.
[Quick Preview] Quickly access competitor information.
[Quick Preview] Monthly sales, total sales, and sales trends.
[Product Sourcing] One-click access to 1688 for reverse image searches.
[Profit Calculator] Calculate profits with a single click by entering weight and purchase price.

**1688 Collection**
[Batch Collection] Collect data in bulk from search result pages and store pages.
[Quick Preview] Improve your competitive analysis efficiency by adding more detailed data to the product list in a way that DOM  blocking(only appending new DOM elements, without modification).
[Quick Preview] Quickly jump to store pages and collect data rapidly, including key information.
long.zh_CN:
完全免费的选品插件  - 智赢选品

亚马逊选品
[快速预览]   一键获取当前页面所有ASIN详细数据，产品分析效率直线提升。
[品牌分析]  显示商品的品牌名称是否被注册商标，避免侵权。
[推荐市场]  避开红海市场。
[关键词反查] 获取该ASIN的各种关键字在自然流量下的排名。支持关键词导出，直接用来优化Listing和PPC广告。
[出单词反查]  用于反查任一目标ASIN的Top出单词；也就是买家通过搜索该关 键词后对该ASIN产生了点击和转化。
[多站点支持] 支持亚马逊12个站点，七种语言

美客多选品
[快速预览]   快速获取SKU详细信息
[找货]  一键跳转1688以图搜图 并计算利润

OZON选品
[快速预览]   快速获取SKU详细信息
[快速预览]   快速获取跟卖信息
[快速预览]   月销量 总销量 销量趋势
[找货]  一键跳转1688以图搜图 
[利润计算器] 输入重量和采购价一键计算利润

1688采集
[批量采集] 搜索结果页，店铺页批量采集
[快速预览] 快速跳转店铺页 和 快速采集 以及一些关键信息预览
